abstract: Arizona State men's basketball team defeat Connecticut, 68-61, in National Invitation Tournament opener.
lead_paragraph: Shaquielle McKissic scored 22 points as Arizona State beat host Connecticut, the 2014 N.C.A.A. champion, in the first round of the N.I.T., 68-61.

headline.main: UConn Falls in First Round of N.I.T.
headline.print_headline: UConn Falls in First Round of N.I.T.

snippet: Shaquielle McKissic scored 22 points as Arizona State beat host Connecticut, the 2014 N.C.A.A. champion, in the first round of the N.I.T., 68-61.
